00026 #ifndef NOISEPP_BILLOW_H
00027 #define NOISEPP_BILLOW_H
00028 
00029 #include "NoisePerlin.h"
00030 
00031 namespace noisepp
00032 {
00033         typedef PerlinModuleBase BillowModuleBase;
00034 
00035         class BillowElement1D : public PipelineElement1D
00036         {
00037                 private:
00038                         struct Octave
00039                         {
00040                                 int seed;
00041                                 Real scale;
00042                                 Real persistence;
00043                         };
00044                         Octave *mOctaves;
00045                         size_t mOctaveCount;
00046                         int mQuality;
00047                         Real mScale;
00048 
00049                         NOISEPP_INLINE Real calculateGradient (Real x, int seed) const
00050                         {
00051                                 if (mQuality == NOISE_QUALITY_STD)
00052                                         return Generator1D::calcGradientCoherentNoiseStd (x, seed, mScale);
00053                                 else if (mQuality == NOISE_QUALITY_HIGH)
00054                                         return Generator1D::calcGradientCoherentNoiseHigh (x, seed, mScale);
00055                                 else if (mQuality == NOISE_QUALITY_LOW)
00056                                         return Generator1D::calcGradientCoherentNoiseLow (x, seed, mScale);
00057                                 else if (mQuality == NOISE_QUALITY_FAST_STD)
00058                                         return Generator1D::calcGradientCoherentFastNoiseStd (x, seed, mScale);
00059                                 else if (mQuality == NOISE_QUALITY_FAST_HIGH)
00060                                         return Generator1D::calcGradientCoherentFastNoiseHigh (x, seed, mScale);
00061                                 else
00062                                         return Generator1D::calcGradientCoherentFastNoiseLow (x, seed, mScale);
00063                         }
00064                 public:
00065                         BillowElement1D (size_t octaves, Real frequency, Real lacunarity, Real persistence, int mainSeed, int quality, Real nscale) : mOctaveCount(octaves), mQuality(quality), mScale(nscale)
00066                         {
00067                                 if (quality > NOISE_QUALITY_HIGH)
00068                                         mScale *= FAST_NOISE_SCALE_FACTOR;
00069                                 mOctaves = new Octave[mOctaveCount];
00070                                 Real curPersistence = 1.0;
00071                                 int seed;
00072                                 Real scale = frequency;
00073                                 for (size_t o=0;o<mOctaveCount;++o)
00074                                 {
00075                                         seed = (mainSeed + int(o)) & 0xffffffff;
00076                                         mOctaves[o].persistence = curPersistence;
00077                                         mOctaves[o].scale = scale;
00078                                         mOctaves[o].seed = seed;
00079 
00080                                         scale *= lacunarity;
00081                                         curPersistence *= persistence;
00082                                 }
00083                         }
00084                         virtual ~BillowElement1D ()
00085                         {
00086                                 delete mOctaves;
00087                                 mOctaves = NULL;
00088                         }
00089                         virtual Real getValue (Real x, Cache *cache) const
00090                         {
00091                                 Real value = 0.5;
00092                                 Real signal = 1.0;
00093 
00094                                 for (size_t o=0;o<mOctaveCount;++o)
00095                                 {
00096                                         const Real nx = Math::MakeInt32Range (x * mOctaves[o].scale);
00097                                         signal = calculateGradient(nx, mOctaves[o].seed);
00098                                         signal = Real(2.0) * std::fabs (signal) - Real(1.0);
00099 
00100                                         value += signal * mOctaves[o].persistence;
00101                                 }
00102 
00103                                 return value;
00104                         }
00105         };
00106 
00107         class BillowElement2D : public PipelineElement2D
00108         {
00109                 private:
00110                         struct Octave
00111                         {
00112                                 int seed;
00113                                 Real scale;
00114                                 Real persistence;
00115                         };
00116                         Octave *mOctaves;
00117                         size_t mOctaveCount;
00118                         int mQuality;
00119                         Real mScale;
00120 
00121                         NOISEPP_INLINE Real calculateGradient (Real x, Real y, int seed) const
00122                         {
00123                                 if (mQuality == NOISE_QUALITY_STD)
00124                                         return Generator2D::calcGradientCoherentNoiseStd (x, y, seed, mScale);
00125                                 else if (mQuality == NOISE_QUALITY_HIGH)
00126                                         return Generator2D::calcGradientCoherentNoiseHigh (x, y, seed, mScale);
00127                                 else if (mQuality == NOISE_QUALITY_LOW)
00128                                         return Generator2D::calcGradientCoherentNoiseLow (x, y, seed, mScale);
00129                                 else if (mQuality == NOISE_QUALITY_FAST_STD)
00130                                         return Generator2D::calcGradientCoherentFastNoiseStd (x, y, seed, mScale);
00131                                 else if (mQuality == NOISE_QUALITY_FAST_HIGH)
00132                                         return Generator2D::calcGradientCoherentFastNoiseHigh (x, y, seed, mScale);
00133                                 else
00134                                         return Generator2D::calcGradientCoherentFastNoiseLow (x, y, seed, mScale);
00135                         }
00136                 public:
00137                         BillowElement2D (size_t octaves, Real frequency, Real lacunarity, Real persistence, int mainSeed, int quality, Real nscale) : mOctaveCount(octaves), mQuality(quality), mScale(nscale)
00138                         {
00139                                 if (quality > NOISE_QUALITY_HIGH)
00140                                         mScale *= FAST_NOISE_SCALE_FACTOR;
00141                                 mOctaves = new Octave[mOctaveCount];
00142                                 Real curPersistence = 1.0;
00143                                 int seed;
00144                                 Real scale = frequency;
00145                                 for (size_t o=0;o<mOctaveCount;++o)
00146                                 {
00147                                         seed = (mainSeed + int(o)) & 0xffffffff;
00148                                         mOctaves[o].persistence = curPersistence;
00149                                         mOctaves[o].scale = scale;
00150                                         mOctaves[o].seed = seed;
00151 
00152                                         scale *= lacunarity;
00153                                         curPersistence *= persistence;
00154                                 }
00155                         }
00156                         virtual ~BillowElement2D ()
00157                         {
00158                                 delete mOctaves;
00159                                 mOctaves = NULL;
00160                         }
00161                         virtual Real getValue (Real x, Real y, Cache *cache) const
00162                         {
00163                                 Real value = 0.5;
00164                                 Real signal = 1.0;
00165 
00166                                 for (size_t o=0;o<mOctaveCount;++o)
00167                                 {
00168                                         const Real nx = Math::MakeInt32Range (x * mOctaves[o].scale);
00169                                         const Real ny = Math::MakeInt32Range (y * mOctaves[o].scale);
00170                                         signal = calculateGradient(nx, ny, mOctaves[o].seed);
00171                                         signal = Real(2.0) * std::fabs (signal) - Real(1.0);
00172 
00173                                         value += signal * mOctaves[o].persistence;
00174                                 }
00175 
00176                                 return value;
00177                         }
00178         };
00179 
00180         class BillowElement3D : public PipelineElement3D
00181         {
00182                 private:
00183                         struct Octave
00184                         {
00185                                 int seed;
00186                                 Real scale;
00187                                 Real persistence;
00188                         };
00189                         Octave *mOctaves;
00190                         size_t mOctaveCount;
00191                         int mQuality;
00192                         Real mScale;
00193 
00194                         NOISEPP_INLINE Real calculateGradient (Real x, Real y, Real z, int seed) const
00195                         {
00196                                 if (mQuality == NOISE_QUALITY_STD)
00197                                         return Generator3D::calcGradientCoherentNoiseStd (x, y, z, seed, mScale);
00198                                 else if (mQuality == NOISE_QUALITY_HIGH)
00199                                         return Generator3D::calcGradientCoherentNoiseHigh (x, y, z, seed, mScale);
00200                                 else if (mQuality == NOISE_QUALITY_LOW)
00201                                         return Generator3D::calcGradientCoherentNoiseLow (x, y, z, seed, mScale);
00202                                 else if (mQuality == NOISE_QUALITY_FAST_STD)
00203                                         return Generator3D::calcGradientCoherentFastNoiseStd (x, y, z, seed, mScale);
00204                                 else if (mQuality == NOISE_QUALITY_FAST_HIGH)
00205                                         return Generator3D::calcGradientCoherentFastNoiseHigh (x, y, z, seed, mScale);
00206                                 else
00207                                         return Generator3D::calcGradientCoherentFastNoiseLow (x, y, z, seed, mScale);
00208                         }
00209                 public:
00210                         BillowElement3D (size_t octaves, Real frequency, Real lacunarity, Real persistence, int mainSeed, int quality, Real nscale) : mOctaveCount(octaves), mQuality(quality), mScale(nscale)
00211                         {
00212                                 if (quality > NOISE_QUALITY_HIGH)
00213                                         mScale *= FAST_NOISE_SCALE_FACTOR;
00214                                 mOctaves = new Octave[mOctaveCount];
00215                                 Real curPersistence = 1.0;
00216                                 int seed;
00217                                 Real scale = frequency;
00218                                 for (size_t o=0;o<mOctaveCount;++o)
00219                                 {
00220                                         seed = (mainSeed + int(o)) & 0xffffffff;
00221                                         mOctaves[o].persistence = curPersistence;
00222                                         mOctaves[o].scale = scale;
00223                                         mOctaves[o].seed = seed;
00224 
00225                                         scale *= lacunarity;
00226                                         curPersistence *= persistence;
00227                                 }
00228                         }
00229                         virtual ~BillowElement3D ()
00230                         {
00231                                 delete mOctaves;
00232                                 mOctaves = NULL;
00233                         }
00234                         virtual Real getValue (Real x, Real y, Real z, Cache *cache) const
00235                         {
00236                                 Real value = 0.5;
00237                                 Real signal = 1.0;
00238 
00239                                 for (size_t o=0;o<mOctaveCount;++o)
00240                                 {
00241                                         const Real nx = Math::MakeInt32Range (x * mOctaves[o].scale);
00242                                         const Real ny = Math::MakeInt32Range (y * mOctaves[o].scale);
00243                                         const Real nz = Math::MakeInt32Range (z * mOctaves[o].scale);
00244                                         signal = calculateGradient(nx, ny, nz, mOctaves[o].seed);
00245                                         signal = Real(2.0) * std::fabs (signal) - Real(1.0);
00246 
00247                                         value += signal * mOctaves[o].persistence;
00248                                 }
00249 
00250                                 return value;
00251                         }
00252         };
00253 
00257         class BillowModule : public BillowModuleBase
00258         {
00259                 public:
00261                         ElementID addToPipeline (Pipeline1D *pipe) const
00262                         {
00263                                 return pipe->addElement (this, new BillowElement1D(mOctaveCount, mFrequency, mLacunarity, mPersistence, mSeed+pipe->getSeed(), mQuality, mScale));
00264                         }
00266                         ElementID addToPipeline (Pipeline2D *pipe) const
00267                         {
00268                                 return pipe->addElement (this, new BillowElement2D(mOctaveCount, mFrequency, mLacunarity, mPersistence, mSeed+pipe->getSeed(), mQuality, mScale));
00269                         }
00271                         ElementID addToPipeline (Pipeline3D *pipe) const
00272                         {
00273                                 return pipe->addElement (this, new BillowElement3D(mOctaveCount, mFrequency, mLacunarity, mPersistence, mSeed+pipe->getSeed(), mQuality, mScale));
00274                         }
00276                         ModuleTypeId getType() const { return MODULE_BILLOW; }
00277         };
00278 };
00279
